Title: Pokemon XY&Z: Subete no Nazo wo Tokiakase!
Description: ['The second half of the special will look back at the series so far and provide a complete explanation of "all the mysteries" in the show.', '\n', '\r\nIt will also preview what will happen in the future of the series.']
